title: Allianz Subsidiary Pleads Guilty to Defrauding Investors
sub_head: Justice Department says fraud scheme led to billions of dollars in losses
body:
One of Allianz SE â€™s U.S. investing divisions pleaded guilty and agreed to pay more than $6 billion in penalties and restitution for a scheme to defraud private-fund investors, the Justice Department said Tuesday.
Three former employees of Allianz Global Investors were also charged in the scheme. Two have pleaded guilty.
